page.title: 15TRANSPORT 2 HISTORY
page.content: The original main London Rd used to run from Yonsea Farm (on present A20) to Home Farm on a line that is now shown as a non-maintained vehicular right of way on the O.S. map. It is now nothing more than an obscure way across fields that few people know about.From Home Farm it passed by the main gate & gate houses of Hothfield Place,up Coach Drive & along Cade Rd. to rejoin the present A20.During the late 18th C. a large pond in Hothfield adjacent to West Street was drained, its north bank cut away & dumped in the field to the north.The main Hothfield to Pluckley Rd, now West Street,was re-routed from its line on the south bank to where the north bank had been;terraced cottages were then built where the pond had lain.Traffic then was pedestrian or horse drawn.
